input.sql:
select distinct
opp.CurrencyIsoCode,
acct.col_legacyaccountid as legacyaccountid,
acct.col_mdmid as mdmid,
CASE
    WHEN opp.RelationshipType__c LIKE 'Fin%' THEN 'Financial Partner'
    WHEN opp.RelationshipType__c LIKE 'Inf%' THEN 'Influencing'
    WHEN opp.RelationshipType__c LIKE 'RESELLER2%' THEN 'Reseller 2'
    ELSE opp.RelationshipType__c
END AS RelationshipType_Label,
opp.PartnerTierName__c,
partnername.value,
opp.PartnerName__c,
opportunity.opportunitynumber,
opportunity.superregion



from #{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_smart_list","line":"c8009b2f","path":["list_name"]}')} as opp

left join #{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_smart_list","line":"74e37a22","path":["list_name"]}')}as acct 
on opp.Partner__c = acct.col_legacyaccountid

left join #{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_smart_list","line":"512a4c7b","path":["list_name"]}')} as partnername 
on opp.PartnerTypeName__c = partnername.partnertypename

left join #{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_smart_list","line":"684c2685","path":["list_name"]}')} as opportunity 
on opp.Opportunity__c = opportunity.opportunityid
